000.text: Ah, greetings, young magician! I have a couple of tasks to cope with... Would you like to help me? Of course, I will give you an interesting bonus =)

1000.text: It's nice to hear that you're ready to help me out. Are you ready for the first task?

2000.text: Don`t worry, my friend. I will wait for you here!

001.text: My first task for you is to explore the world! I think, you could buy one more thread to extend your equipment and earn 10 coins. It will be perfect start! You can find an information about your quest opening QuestBar on the left side of screen.

002.text: Great job! I have the second task for you.

003.text: Your task is to defeat one of the enemies. However, try your luck first, maybe it will bring you something interesting! You can find an information about your quest opening QuestBar on the left side of screen.

004.text: Wow! Perfect! I have one task left at this level. Would you like to start it now?

005.text: I think, that now you are ready to defeat all the enemies of our magical world. However, don't forget to buy some equipment to get stronger! You can find an information about your quest opening QuestBar on the left side of screen.

006.text: You are good! All tasks on this level are done. Let`s go to the next level!

007.text: Nice to meet you again! I hope, you rested well and are ready for new challenges.

008.text: I am glad to hear that. Would you like to deal with the first task?

009.text: Unfortunately, I lost my brown buttons. Please find them and also buy a diamond for future magical battles! You can find an information about your quest opening QuestBar on the left side of screen.

010.text: Yeah, super start! And now I have the next task for you. Are you interested in doing it now?

011.text: It seems to me, that at this moment you are experienced magician. Earn 10 coins and fight 4 enemies - the best way is to choose those you have already encountered. You can find an information about your quest opening QuestBar on the left side of screen.

012.text: Excellent result! I have the last task for you at this level. Do you want to start it now?

013.text: It is the best moment to fight with all the enemies of our magical world, especially with 2 new FASHION ENEMIES. However, don't forget to buy some equipment to get stronger! You can find an information about your quest opening QuestBar on the left side of screen.

014.text: Perfect! All tasks on this level are done. Let`s go to the next level!

015.text: I am glad to see you here! Please, give me a few minutes to prepare new tasks for you.
